articles.description: Spanish teenager Carlos Alcaraz capped another impressive week with a straight-sets victory over Alexander Zverev on Sunday to win the Madrid Open
articles.content: Spanish teenager Carlos Alcaraz capped another impressive week with a straight-sets victory over Alexander Zverev on Sunday to win the Madrid Open and become the second-youngest player to win two Mas… [+2691 chars]

articles.author: Sami Mokbel
articles.title: Jesse Marsch's passing principle is admirable but there's a right time and place to implement it - Daily Mail
articles.description: The Emirates Stadium, against an Arsenal front three relentless in their efforts to put opposing defenders under pressure, wasn't the place.
articles.content:
It was almost like Jesse Marsch was oblivious to what was happening.
In many ways, you have to admire the Leeds managers devotion to his passing principles. But theres a time and place.
With Leeds … [+3313 chars]

articles.author: Mike Walters
articles.title: Furious Watford fans want Roy Hodgson sacked after decision to ignore - The Mirror
articles.description: Watford's relegation to the Championship was sealed on Saturday with a 1-0 defeat at Selhurst Park against Hodgson's former club, Crystal Palace, and his post-match move - or lack of - has led to fury from fans
articles.content:
Furious Watford fans want to force out Roy Hodgson for ignoring them when relegation was sealed and blowing a kiss to his old Crystal Palace flock instead. 
Hodgson's short-term reign at Vicarage Ro… [+2049 chars]

articles.author: Daniel Davis
articles.title: Luke Ayling is branded an 'idiot' for 'disgusting' tackle in Arsenal clash by Jamie Carragher - Daily Mail
articles.description: Ayling clattered into Gabriel Martinelli near the corner flag after just 27 minutes, with his struggling side already trailing by two goals.
articles.content:
Luke Ayling has been scathingly labelled an 'idiot' by Jamie Carragher after his horror tackle during Leeds' chastening Premier League encounter against Arsenal on Sunday.
